WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 12.00 noon on 24 December 2024.
Condition of Rain:
Mainly fair weather will prevail sea areas around the island.
Winds:
Winds will be north-westerly to westerly in the sea areas around the island and speed will be (20-
30) kmph. Wind speed can increase up to 40 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Beruwala to Hambanthota via Galle and Matara, and from Mullaittivu to Trincomalee.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coast extending from Beruwala to Hambanthota via Galle and Matara, and
from Mullaittivu to Trincomalee may be fairly rough at times.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
